page.name: Network & Infrastructure
page.page_description: Welcome to the Network and Infrastructure status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Network & Infrastructure OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Network & Infrastructure's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Network] - vRack incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on vRack offer has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 19/05/2025 09:57 UTC End time : 23/05/2025 14:02 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Configuration of vRack network was temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Since 23/05/2025 12:30 UTC, customers are able to configure their vRack without a problem. Impacted customers between 19/05/2025 09:57 UTC and 23/05/2025 12:30 UTC are able to configure their vRack network (add/remove servers from vRack) since 23/05/2025 14:02 UTC. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Network] - Network Core incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that we had an incident on our Network Core service. This incident has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 15/05/2025 19:52 UTC End time : 15/05/2025 19:57 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Access to the servers in the RBX datacenter was unavailable from other datacenters. Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access their servers located in RBX datacenter from another datacenters. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [LIM1][Infrastructure] - Room L111 & L112 incident notification
incidents.message: We had an incident on Infrastructure which has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 11/05/2025 21:05 UTC End time : 11/05/2025 23:21 UTC Impacted Service(s) : An increase in the temperature of the racks in these rooms has caused some of the servers to reboot. Customers Impact : The cooling system was temporarily affected for some servers, which may result in downtime or reduced performance. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [BHS1/GRA1/RBX4/SBG3/SGP1/SYD3/YNM1/YYZ1][Network & Infrastructure] - OVHcloud Load Balancer incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on our OVHcloud Load Balancer has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 05/03/2025 16:23 UTC End time : 05/03/2025 16:35 UTC Impacted Service : A reset of connection on existing traffic has been observed between 16:36:18 UTC and 16:37:23 UTC. Customers Impact : Some customers had temporarily lost their connection to our Loadbalancer between 16:36:18 UTC and 16:37:23 UTC. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
